SubmitAnswersToDb()

On clicking the submitbutton and raising the click event: Submits the answers to the database and ends the survey Depending on notification mode sends email message (3 options) to administrator Optionally redirects to new url Optionally shows thank you message to surveytaker (buildthankbox)

Declaration
protected virtual void SubmitAnswersToDb()
